title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 §§ 251-1.1 - General policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 §§ 251-1.1 - General policy

State Regulations

All incidents of inmate violations of rules and
regulations, inmate misbehavior and inmate failure or refusal to comply with an
instruction given by an employee acting within the scope of his official duties
shall be handled as quietly and routinely as possible, giving due regard to
danger to life, health, security and property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
§§
251-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
